name: Zombie Runner (rafalfaro)
description:
Unity demo based on course https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse2 Section 6. 

Source code available here.

Controls

  • Mouse = aim
  • Click = shoot
  • Scroll Wheel = switch weapon
  • left shift = Run
  • 1 = Weapon 1
  • 2 = Weapon 2
  • 3 = Weapon 3
